Sql.query: insert into me_medicion24( lectcodi, medifecha, tipoinfocodi, ptomedicodi, meditotal, mediestado, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, lastuser, lastdate, emprcodi, t1, t2, t3, t4, t5, t6, t7, t8, t9, t10, t11, t12, t13, t14, t15, t16, t17, t18, t19, t20, t21, t22, t23, t24 ) values( :lectcodi, :medifecha, :tipoinfocodi, :ptomedicodi, :meditotal, :mediestado, :h1, :h2, :h3, :h4, :h5, :h6, :h7, :h8, :h9, :h10, :h11, :h12, :h13, :h14, :h15, :h16, :h17, :h18, :h19, :h20, :h21, :h22, :h23, :h24, :lastuser, :lastdate, :emprcodi, :t1, :t2, :t3, :t4, :t5, :t6, :t7, :t8, :t9, :t10, :t11, :t12, :t13, :t14, :t15, :t16, :t17, :t18, :t19, :t20, :t21, :t22, :t23, :t24 )

update me_medicion24 set lectcodi = :lectcodi, medifecha = :medifecha, tipoinfocodi = :tipoinfocodi, ptomedicodi = :ptomedicodi, meditotal = :meditotal, mediestado = :mediestado, h1 = :h1, h2 = :h2, h3 = :h3, h4 = :h4, h5 = :h5, h6 = :h6, h7 = :h7, h8 = :h8, h9 = :h9, h10 = :h10, h11 = :h11, h12 = :h12, h13 = :h13, h14 = :h14, h15 = :h15, h16 = :h16, h17 = :h17, h18 = :h18, h19 = :h19, h20 = :h20, h21 = :h21, h22 = :h22, h23 = :h23, h24 = :h24, lastuser = :lastuser, lastdate = :lastdate where
delete from me_medicion24 where

select lectcodi, medifecha, tipoinfocodi, ptomedicodi, meditotal, mediestado, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, lastuser, lastdate where from me_medicion24

select * from me_medicion24 m24 inner join me_ptomedicion pto on pto.ptomedicodi = m24.ptomedicodi where pto.origlectcodi = 16 and m24.medifecha >= to_date('2016-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AND m24.medifecha <= to_date('2016-09-02','YYYY-MM-DD') order by pto.ptomedicodi, m24.medifecha

select lectcodi, medifecha, tipoinfocodi, ptomedicodi, meditotal, mediestado, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, lastuser, lastdate from me_medicion24

select b.* from( select a.* ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY medifecha,ptomedicodi,lectcodi, tipoinfocodi ORDER BY medifecha,ptomedicodi,lectcodi, tipoinfocodi, PRIORIDAD) AS NUM from( select m24.medifecha,m24.ptomedicodi,m24.lectcodi, m24.tipoinfocodi, m24.meditotal, m24.mediestado, m24.h1, m24.h2, m24.h3, m24.h4, m24.h5, m24.h6, m24.h7, m24.h8, m24.h9, m24.h10, m24.h11, m24.h12, m24.h13, m24.h14, m24.h15, m24.h16, m24.h17, m24.h18, m24.h19, m24.h20, m24.h21, m24.h22, m24.h23, m24.h24, m24.t1, m24.t2, m24.t3, m24.t4, m24.t5, m24.t6, m24.t7, m24.t8, m24.t9, m24.t10, m24.t11, m24.t12, m24.t13, m24.t14, m24.t15, m24.t16, m24.t17, m24.t18, m24.t19, m24.t20, m24.t21, m24.t22, m24.t23, m24.t24, m24.lastuser, m24.lastdate, tpto.TPTOMEDINOMB,eq.equinomb,ti.tipoinfoabrev,pto.ptomedibarranomb, eq.famcodi, tpto.TPTOMEDICODI,empr.emprcodi, empr.emprnomb, eq2.equinomb cuenca,fam.famabrev, 1 as PRIORIDAD from me_medicion24 m24 inner join me_ptomedicion pto on pto.ptomedicodi = m24.ptomedicodi inner join eq_equipo eq on eq.equicodi = pto.equicodi inner join eq_familia fam on fam.famcodi = eq.famcodi inner join eq_equipo eq1 on eq1.equicodi = eq.equipadre inner join eq_equipo eq2 on eq2.equicodi = eq1.equipadre inner join me_tipoptomedicion tpto on tpto.TPTOMEDICODI = pto.TPTOMEDICODI --and m24.tipoinfocodi = tpto.tipoinfocodi inner join si_tipoinformacion ti on ti.tipoinfocodi = m24.tipoinfocodi inner join si_empresa empr on empr.emprcodi = (case when coalesce(m24.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 then m24.EMPRCODI else pto.emprcodi end) where m24.lectcodi = {0} and pto.origlectcodi ={1} and m24.medifecha >= to_date('{2}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND (empr.emprcodi in ({4}) or '{4}' = '-1') and (eq.famcodi in ({7}) or '{7}' = '-1') and (eq1.equipadre in ({5}) or '{5}' = '-1') and m24.medifecha <= to_date('{3}','YYYY-MM-DD') and tpto.TPTOMEDICODI in ({6}) and eq2.equicodi > 0
UNION
select m24.medifecha,m24.ptomedicodi,m24.lectcodi, m24.tipoinfocodi, m24.meditotal, m24.mediestado, m24.h1, m24.h2, m24.h3, m24.h4, m24.h5, m24.h6, m24.h7, m24.h8, m24.h9, m24.h10, m24.h11, m24.h12, m24.h13, m24.h14, m24.h15, m24.h16, m24.h17, m24.h18, m24.h19, m24.h20, m24.h21, m24.h22, m24.h23, m24.h24, m24.t1, m24.t2, m24.t3, m24.t4, m24.t5, m24.t6, m24.t7, m24.t8, m24.t9, m24.t10, m24.t11, m24.t12, m24.t13, m24.t14, m24.t15, m24.t16, m24.t17, m24.t18, m24.t19, m24.t20, m24.t21, m24.t22, m24.t23, m24.t24, m24.lastuser, m24.lastdate, tpto.TPTOMEDINOMB,eq.equinomb,ti.tipoinfoabrev,pto.ptomedibarranomb, eq.famcodi, tpto.TPTOMEDICODI,empr.emprcodi, empr.emprnomb, eq1.equinomb cuenca,fam.famabrev, 2 as PRIORIDAD from me_medicion24 m24 inner join me_ptomedicion pto on pto.ptomedicodi = m24.ptomedicodi inner join eq_equipo eq on eq.equicodi = pto.equicodi inner join eq_familia fam on fam.famcodi = eq.famcodi inner join eq_equipo eq1 on eq1.equicodi = eq.equipadre inner join me_tipoptomedicion tpto on tpto.TPTOMEDICODI = pto.TPTOMEDICODI --and m24.tipoinfocodi = tpto.tipoinfocodi inner join si_tipoinformacion ti on ti.tipoinfocodi = m24.tipoinfocodi inner join si_empresa empr on empr.emprcodi = (case when coalesce(m24.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 then m24.EMPRCODI else pto.emprcodi end) where m24.lectcodi = {0} and pto.origlectcodi ={1} and m24.medifecha >= to_date('{2}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND (empr.emprcodi in ({4}) or '{4}' = '-1') and (eq.famcodi in ({7}) or '{7}' = '-1') and (eq.equipadre in ({5}) or '{5}' = '-1') and m24.medifecha <= to_date('{3}','YYYY-MM-DD') and tpto.TPTOMEDICODI in ({6}) )a )b where num=1 --order by 1 asc, 2 asc

select m24.medifecha,m24.ptomedicodi,m24.lectcodi, m24.tipoinfocodi, m24.meditotal, m24.mediestado, m24.h1, m24.h2, m24.h3, m24.h4, m24.h5, m24.h6, m24.h7, m24.h8, m24.h9, m24.h10, m24.h11, m24.h12, m24.h13, m24.h14, m24.h15, m24.h16, m24.h17, m24.h18, m24.h19, m24.h20, m24.h21, m24.h22, m24.h23, m24.h24, m24.t1, m24.t2, m24.t3, m24.t4, m24.t5, m24.t6, m24.t7, m24.t8, m24.t9, m24.t10, m24.t11, m24.t12, m24.t13, m24.t14, m24.t15, m24.t16, m24.t17, m24.t18, m24.t19, m24.t20, m24.t21, m24.t22, m24.t23, m24.t24, m24.lastuser, m24.lastdate, tpto.TPTOMEDINOMB,eq.equinomb,ti.tipoinfoabrev,pto.ptomedibarranomb, eq.famcodi, tpto.TPTOMEDICODI, empr.emprcodi, empr.emprnomb, eq1.equicodi,eq1.equinomb cuenca,eq.equipadre from me_medicion24 m24 inner join me_ptomedicion pto on pto.ptomedicodi = m24.ptomedicodi inner join eq_equipo eq on eq.equicodi = pto.equicodi inner join eq_equipo eq1 on eq1.equicodi = eq.equipadre inner join me_tipoptomedicion tpto on tpto.TPTOMEDICODI = pto.TPTOMEDICODI inner join si_tipoinformacion ti on ti.tipoinfocodi = m24.tipoinfocodi inner join si_empresa empr on empr.emprcodi = (case when coalesce(m24.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 then m24.EMPRCODI else pto.emprcodi end) inner join me_reporte rpte on rpte.lectcodi = m24.lectcodi inner join ME_REPORPTOMED rpto on rpto.reporcodi = rpte.reporcodi and m24.ptomedicodi = rpto.ptomedicodi where rpte.reporcodi = {0} and pto.origlectcodi =16 and m24.medifecha >= to_date('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND m24.medifecha <= to_date('{2}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND (empr.emprcodi in ({3}) or '{3}' = '-1') and m24.lectcodi = {5} and (m24.tipoinfocodi in ({4}) or '{4}' = '-1') order by 1 asc, 2 asc

delete from me_medicion24 where lectcodi = {0} and medifecha >= to_date('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD') and medifecha < to_date('{2}','YYYY-MM-DD') and ('{4}'='-1' or emprcodi = {4}) and ptomedicodi in ( --Puntos de medici√≥n de la empresa segun la fecha de inicio SELECT distinct ptomedicodi FROM ( SELECT HP.HPTOCODI,vwpt.HPTDATFECHA ,hp.ptomedicodi, pto.PTOMEDIELENOMB , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY HP.HPTOCODI ORDER BY HP.HPTOCODI,vwpt.HPTDATFECHA desc, vwpt.HPTDATPTOESTADO desc) AS NUM_VIEW ,vwpt.HPTDATPTOESTADO ,CASE WHEN vwpt.HPTDATPTOESTADO = 'F' THEN 0 ELSE HP.HPTOACTIVO END AS HPTOACTIVO from me_hojaptomed HP inner join ME_PTOMEDICION PTO ON PTO.PTOMEDICODI = HP.PTOMEDICODI inner join SI_HISEMPPTO_DATA vwpt on vwpt.HPTDATFECHA <= TO_DATE('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD') and (vwpt.PTOMEDICODI = pto.PTOMEDICODI OR vwpt.PTOMEDICODIOLD = pto.PTOMEDICODI) WHERE hp.formatcodi = {3} and ('{4}'='-1' or vwpt.EMPRCODI = {4}) )rview WHERE NUM_VIEW = 1 )

select (case when coalesce(me.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 then me.EMPRCODI else pto.emprcodi end) AS EMPRCODI, me.* from me_medicion24 me inner join me_hojaptomed hp on hp.ptomedicodi = me.ptomedicodi and hp.tipoinfocodi = me.tipoinfocodi inner join me_formato f on f.formatcodi = hp.formatcodi inner join me_ptomedicion pto on pto.ptomedicodi = hp.ptomedicodi where (hp.formatcodi = {0} or ('{0}' ='-1')) and f.lectcodi = me.lectcodi and ((case when coalesce(me.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 then me.EMPRCODI else pto.emprcodi end) = {1} or ('{1}' ='-1')) and medifecha >= to_date('{2}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND medifecha <= to_date('{3}','YYYY-MM-DD') order by hp.HPTOORDEN asc

select (case when coalesce(me.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 then me.EMPRCODI else pto.emprcodi end) AS EMPRCODI, me.* from me_medicion24 me inner join me_hojaptomed hp on hp.ptomedicodi = me.ptomedicodi and hp.tipoinfocodi = me.tipoinfocodi inner join me_formato fh on fh.formatcodi = hp.formatcodi inner join me_formato f on f.formatcodi = fh.formatsecundario and f.lectcodi = me.lectcodi inner join me_ptomedicion pto on pto.ptomedicodi = hp.ptomedicodi where hp.formatcodi = {0} and ( (case when coalesce(me.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 then me.EMPRCODI else pto.emprcodi end) = {1} or {1} = -1) and medifecha >= to_date('{2}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND medifecha < to_date('{3}','YYYY-MM-DD') order by hp.HPTOORDEN asc

select (case when coalesce(m24.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 then m24.EMPRCODI else pto.emprcodi end) AS EMPRCODI, m24.*, tpto.TPTOMEDINOMB,eq.equinomb,ti.tipoinfoabrev from me_medicion24 m24 inner join me_ptomedicion pto on pto.ptomedicodi = m24.ptomedicodi inner join eq_equipo eq on eq.equicodi = pto.equicodi inner join me_tipoptomedicion tpto on tpto.TPTOMEDICODI = pto.TPTOMEDICODI inner join si_tipoinformacion ti on ti.tipoinfocodi = m24.tipoinfocodi inner join si_empresa empr on empr.emprcodi = (case when coalesce(m24.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 then m24.EMPRCODI else pto.emprcodi end) where m24.lectcodi = {0} and pto.origlectcodi ={1} and pto.ptomedicodi in ({2}) and m24.medifecha >= to_date('{3}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND m24.medifecha <= to_date('{4}','YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY m24.medifecha asc

select empr.emprcodi, m24.*, tpto.tptomedinomb,eq.equinomb,ti.tipoinfoabrev,pto.ptomedibarranomb, pto.ptomedidesc, tpto.tptomedicodi, empr.emprnomb, pto.ptomedielenomb, eq.equicodi,eqp.equicodi Equipadre,eqp.EQUINOMB Equipopadre,eqp.famcodi from me_medicion24 m24 inner join me_ptomedicion pto on pto.ptomedicodi = m24.ptomedicodi inner join eq_equipo eq on eq.equicodi = pto.equicodi inner join eq_equipo eqp on eqp.equicodi = (case when coalesce(eq.EQUIPADRE, -1) > 0 then eq.EQUIPADRE else eq.equicodi end) inner join pr_grupo pr on pr.grupocodi = eq.grupocodi inner join pr_tipogrupo tgr on tgr.tipogrupocodi = pr.tipogrupocodi inner join me_tipoptomedicion tpto on tpto.tptomedicodi = pto.tptomedicodi inner join si_tipoinformacion ti on ti.tipoinfocodi = m24.tipoinfocodi inner join si_empresa empr on empr.emprcodi = (case when coalesce(m24.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 then m24.EMPRCODI else pto.emprcodi end) where m24.lectcodi = {0} and pto.origlectcodi = {1} and m24.medifecha >= to_date('{3}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND m24.medifecha <= to_date('{4}','YYYY-MM-DD') and (empr.emprcodi in ({2}) or '{2}' = '-1') and (m24.tipoinfocodi in ({6}) or '{6}' = '-1') and tpto.tptomedicodi in ({5}) and (tgr.tipogrupocodi in ({7}) or '{7}' = '-1' ) and m24.tipoinfocodi = 52 order by m24.medifecha asc, m24.ptomedicodi asc

select empr.emprcodi, m24.*, tpto.tptomedinomb,eq.equinomb,ti.tipoinfoabrev,pto.ptomedibarranomb, pto.ptomedidesc, tpto.tptomedicodi, empr.emprnomb, eq.equicodi,eqp.equicodi Equipadre,eqp.EQUINOMB Equipopadre,eqp.famcodi from me_medicion24 m24 inner join me_ptomedicion pto on pto.ptomedicodi = m24.ptomedicodi inner join eq_equipo eq on eq.equicodi = pto.equicodi inner join eq_equipo eqp on eqp.equicodi = (case when coalesce(eq.EQUIPADRE, -1) > 0 then eq.EQUIPADRE else eq.equicodi end) inner join pr_grupo pr on pr.grupocodi = eq.grupocodi inner join pr_tipogrupo tgr on tgr.tipogrupocodi = pr.tipogrupocodi inner join me_tipoptomedicion tpto on tpto.tptomedicodi = pto.tptomedicodi inner join si_tipoinformacion ti on ti.tipoinfocodi = m24.tipoinfocodi inner join si_empresa empr on empr.emprcodi = (case when coalesce(m24.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 then m24.EMPRCODI else pto.emprcodi end) where m24.lectcodi = {0} and pto.origlectcodi = {1} and m24.medifecha >= to_date('{3}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND m24.medifecha <= to_date('{4}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND (empr.emprcodi in ({2}) or '{2}' = '-1') and (tgr.tipogrupocodi in ({5}) or '{5}' = '-1' ) and m24.tipoinfocodi = 50 order by m24.medifecha asc, m24.ptomedicodi asc

select rep.reporcodi, rep.repornombre, repmed.REPPTOORDEN, empr.EMPRCODI, empr.EMPRNOMB, eq.GRUPOCODI, pr.GRUPONOMB, eq.equicodi, eq.EQUINOMB, tpto.TPTOMEDINOMB, ti.TIPOINFOABREV, m24.lectcodi, m24.medifecha, m24.tipoinfocodi, pto.ptomedicodi, m24.meditotal, m24.mediestado, m24.h1, m24.h2, m24.h3, m24.h4, m24.h5, m24.h6, m24.h7, m24.h8, m24.h9, m24.h10, m24.h11, m24.h12, m24.h13, m24.h14, m24.h15, m24.h16, m24.h17, m24.h18, m24.h19, m24.h20, m24.h21, m24.h22, m24.h23, m24.h24, m24.lastuser, m24.lastdate, rownum from me_ptomedicion pto inner join ME_REPORPTOMED repmed on repmed.PTOMEDICODI = pto.PTOMEDICODI inner join ME_REPORTE rep on rep.REPORCODI = repmed.REPORCODI left join ME_MEDICION24 m24 on m24.PTOMEDICODI = pto.PTOMEDICODI and m24.LECTCODI = rep.LECTCODI and m24.medifecha >= to_date('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD') and m24.medifecha <= to_date('{2}','YYYY-MM-DD') inner join eq_equipo eq on eq.equicodi = pto.equicodi left JOIN pr_grupo pr on pr.GRUPOCODI=eq.GRUPOCODI inner join me_tipoptomedicion tpto on tpto.TPTOMEDICODI = pto.TPTOMEDICODI left join si_tipoinformacion ti on ti.tipoinfocodi = m24.tipoinfocodi inner join si_empresa empr on empr.emprcodi = (case when coalesce(m24.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 then m24.EMPRCODI else pto.emprcodi end) where pto.PTOMEDIESTADO = 'A' and rep.reporcodi = {0} ORDER BY repmed.REPPTOORDEN

select lectcodi, medifecha, tipoinfocodi, ptomedicodi, mediestado, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, ( COALESCE(h1, 0) + COALESCE(h2, 0) + COALESCE(h3, 0) + COALESCE(h4, 0) + COALESCE(h5, 0) + COALESCE(h6, 0) + COALESCE(h7, 0) + COALESCE(h8, 0) + COALESCE(h9, 0) + COALESCE(h10, 0) + COALESCE(h11, 0) + COALESCE(h12, 0) + COALESCE(h13, 0) + COALESCE(h14, 0) + COALESCE(h15, 0) + COALESCE(h16, 0) + COALESCE(h17, 0) + COALESCE(h18, 0) + COALESCE(h19, 0) + COALESCE(h20, 0) + COALESCE(h21, 0) + COALESCE(h22, 0) + COALESCE(h23, 0) + COALESCE(h24, 0) ) AS meditotal, lastuser, lastdate, emprcodi from me_medicion24 where medifecha between to_date('{0}','YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD') and lectcodi = {2} and tipoinfocodi ={3} and (ptomedicodi in({4}) or '{4}'='-1')

select rep.reporcodi,rep.repornombre, repmed.REPPTOORDEN, eq.equicodi, eq.EQUINOMB, tpto.TPTOMEDINOMB,tpto.TPTOMEDICODI,pto.ptomedicodi, me.lectcodi, me.medifecha, me.tipoinfocodi, me.mediestado, me.lastuser, me.lastdate, me.emprcodi, sum(me.h1) as h1 ,sum(me.h2) as h2 ,sum(me.h3) as h3 ,sum(me.h4) as h4 ,sum(me.h5) as h5 ,sum(me.h6) as h6 ,sum(me.h7) as h7 ,sum(me.h8) as h8 ,sum(me.h9) as h9 ,sum(me.h10) as h10 ,sum(me.h11) as h11 ,sum(me.h12) as h12 ,sum(me.h13) as h13 ,sum(me.h14) as h14 ,sum(me.h15) as h15 ,sum(me.h16) as h16 ,sum(me.h17) as h17 ,sum(me.h18) as h18 ,sum(me.h19) as h19 ,sum(me.h20) as h20 ,sum(me.h21) as h21 ,sum(me.h22) as h22 ,sum(me.h23) as h23 ,sum(me.h24) as h24, sum(coalesce(h1,0) + coalesce(h2,0) + coalesce(h3,0) + coalesce(h4,0) + coalesce(h5,0) + coalesce(h6,0) + coalesce(h7,0) + coalesce(h8,0) + coalesce(h9,0) + coalesce(h10,0) + coalesce(h11,0) + coalesce(h12,0) + coalesce(h13,0) + coalesce(h14,0) + coalesce(h15,0) + coalesce(h16,0) + coalesce(h17,0) + coalesce(h18,0) + coalesce(h19,0) + coalesce(h20,0) + coalesce(h21,0) + coalesce(h22,0) + coalesce(h23,0) + coalesce(h24,0) ) as MEDITOTAL, eq.osinergcodi,pto.osicodi from me_ptomedicion pto inner join ME_REPORPTOMED repmed on repmed.PTOMEDICODI = pto.PTOMEDICODI inner join ME_REPORTE rep on rep.REPORCODI = repmed.REPORCODI inner join ME_MEDICION24 me on me.PTOMEDICODI = pto.PTOMEDICODI and me.LECTCODI = repmed.LECTCODI and me.medifecha >= to_date('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD') and me.medifecha <= to_date('{2}','YYYY-MM-DD') inner join eq_equipo eq on eq.equicodi = pto.equicodi inner join me_tipoptomedicion tpto on tpto.TPTOMEDICODI = pto.TPTOMEDICODI where pto.PTOMEDIESTADO = 'A' and rep.reporcodi = {0} group by rep.reporcodi,rep.repornombre, repmed.REPPTOORDEN, eq.equicodi, eq.EQUINOMB, tpto.TPTOMEDINOMB,pto.ptomedicodi,tpto.TPTOMEDICODI,me.lectcodi, me.medifecha, me.tipoinfocodi,me.mediestado, me.lastuser, me.lastdate, eq.osinergcodi ,pto.osicodi, me.emprcodi ORDER BY repmed.REPPTOORDEN, me.medifecha

select COALESCE(a.GRUPOINTEGRANTE,'N'), COALESCE(a.TIPOGENERRER,'N'), COALESCE(a.GRUPOTIPOCOGEN,'N'), COALESCE(EMP.EMPRORDEN,9999999),COALESCE(A.GRUPOORDEN,9999999) ,a.grupocodi, c.ptomedicodi, a.grupoabrev, a.gruponomb,a. grupotipo, b.equicodi, central.equinomb central, nvl(b.equipadre,0) equipadre, b.famcodi, b.equiabrev, b.equinomb, pmin.valor Minimo, pefec.valor PotenciaEfectiva, dig.valor as digsilent ,emp.emprcodi, emp.emprnomb ,pmin.FECHAPROPEQUI FECHAPROPEQUImin, pefec.FECHAPROPEQUI FECHAPROPEQUIpefec ,pmin.propcodi propcodimin, pefec.propcodi propcodipefec from me_ptomedicion c inner join pr_grupo a on a.grupocodi=c.grupocodi inner join eq_equipo b on a.grupocodi = b.grupocodi inner join eq_equipo central on central.equicodi = (case when b.famcodi in (4,5,37,39) then b.equicodi else b.equipadre end) inner join si_empresa emp on emp.emprcodi = b.emprcodi left join ( select equicodi, valor from ( select equicodi,valor, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY pe.equicodi ORDER BY pe.EQUICODI,pe.FECHAPROPEQUI DESC) AS NUM from eq_propequi pe where PE.PROPEQUIDELETED = 0 AND pe.propcodi in (1069,1070,1844,1845) and pe.fechapropequi <= to_date('{0}','YYYY-MM-DD') ) where num = 1 )dig on dig.equicodi = b.equicodi left join( select pot_efec.*, to_number(replace(nvl( pot_efec.valor2 ,'0'),'.',','),'999999999999D999999999999999', 'NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.''') as valor from ( SELECT eq.equicodi,eq.famcodi,prop.FECHAPROPEQUI, trim(coalesce(REGEXP_SUBSTR(trim(coalesce(prop.valor,'0')), '^(-|+)?\d+(\.|,)?(\d+)?$'),'0')) as valor2 ,prop.propcodi,p.PROPNOMB, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY eq.equicodi ORDER BY prop.fechapropequi DESC) AS NUM FROM eq_propequi prop inner join eq_equipo eq on eq.equicodi = prop.equicodi inner join eq_propiedad p on p.propcodi = prop.propcodi where prop.PROPEQUIDELETED = 0 and prop.propcodi in(164,645,1710,1602) and prop.fechapropequi <= to_date('{0} 23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') AND eq.famcodi in (2,3,37,39) )pot_efec where num = 1 )pefec on pefec.equicodi = b.equicodi left join( select pot_min.*, to_number(replace(nvl( pot_min.valor2 ,'0'),'.',','),'999999999999D999999999999999', 'NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.''') as valor from ( SELECT eq.equicodi,eq.famcodi,prop.FECHAPROPEQUI, trim(coalesce(REGEXP_SUBSTR(trim(coalesce(prop.valor,'0')), '^(-|+)?\d+(\.|,)?(\d+)?$'),'0')) as valor2 ,prop.propcodi,p.PROPNOMB, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY eq.equicodi ORDER BY prop.fechapropequi DESC) AS NUM FROM eq_propequi prop inner join eq_equipo eq on eq.equicodi = prop.equicodi inner join eq_propiedad p on p.propcodi = prop.propcodi where prop.PROPEQUIDELETED = 0 and prop.propcodi in(299,646) and prop.fechapropequi <= to_date('{0} 23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') AND eq.famcodi in (2,3,37,39) )pot_min where num = 1 )pmin on pmin.equicodi = b.equicodi where c.origlectcodi = 2 and a.grupocodi>0 and b.equiestado in ('A','F') and b.famcodi in (2,3,37,39) and c.ptomediestado = 'A' --ORDER BY 1 DESC,2, 3, 4, 5,a.grupocodi, nvl(b.equipadre,0),pefec.valor,b.equiabrev ORDER BY 1 DESC,2, 3, 4, 5,a.grupocodi, pefec.valor,b.equiabrev

select eq.emprcodi,eqc.equicodi, eq.famcodi, eq.equiabrev, eq.equinomb, eqc.tipoinfocodi, pp.valor as digsilent, h4 as h1,h8 as h2,h12 as h3,h16 as h4,h20 as h5,h24 as h6,h28 as h7,h32 as h8,h36 as h9,h40 as h10,h44 as h11,h48 as h12, h52 as h13,h56 as h14,h60 as h15,h64 as h16,h68 as h17,h72 as h18,h76 as h19,h80 as h20,h84 as h21,h88 as h22,h92 as h23,h96 as h24 ,0 as lectcodi,sp.medifecha,sp.meditotal,sp.mediestado,'' as lastuser,null as lastdate,null as ptomedicodi from eq_equicanal eqc inner join TR_CANAL_SP7 ca on ca.canalcodi = eqc.canalcodi left join me_scada_sp7 sp on sp.canalcodi = ca.canalcodi and sp.medifecha = to_date('{2}','yyyy-mm-dd') inner join EQ_PROPEQUI pp on pp.equicodi = eqc.equicodi and pp.propcodi in ({0}) inner join eq_equipo eq on eq.equicodi = eqc.equicodi where eqc.ecanestado = 'A' and eqc.areacode = 7 --solo las configuraciones del area SPR
delete from me_medicion24 where lectcodi = {0} and medifecha = to_date('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD') and ptomedicodi in ({2}) and tipoinfocodi in ({3})

SELECT * FROM me_medicion24 me INNER JOIN (SELECT ptomedicodi,lectcodi,tipoinfocodi,Max(medifecha) medifecha FROM (SELECT lectcodi, medifecha, tipoinfocodi, ptomedicodi, mediestado, ( COALESCE(h1, 0) + COALESCE(h2, 0) + COALESCE(h3, 0) + COALESCE(h4, 0) + COALESCE(h5, 0) + COALESCE(h6, 0) + COALESCE(h7, 0) + COALESCE(h8, 0) + COALESCE(h9, 0) + COALESCE(h10, 0) + COALESCE(h11, 0) + COALESCE(h12, 0) + COALESCE(h13, 0) + COALESCE(h14, 0) + COALESCE(h15, 0) + COALESCE(h16, 0) + COALESCE(h17, 0) + COALESCE(h18, 0) + COALESCE(h19, 0) + COALESCE(h20, 0) + COALESCE(h21, 0) + COALESCE(h22, 0) + COALESCE(h23, 0) + COALESCE(h24, 0) ) AS meditotal FROM me_medicion24 WHERE medifecha BETWEEN To_date('{0}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND To_date('{1}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND lectcodi = {2} AND tipoinfocodi = {3} AND ptomedicodi IN({4})) WHERE meditotal > 0 GROUP BY ptomedicodi, lectcodi, tipoinfocodi) meg ON ( me.ptomedicodi = meg.ptomedicodi AND me.lectcodi = meg.lectcodi AND me.tipoinfocodi = meg.tipoinfocodi ) AND me.medifecha = meg.medifecha

insert into ME_MEDICION_EJECUTADOS24( enviocodi, lectcodi, medifecha, tipoinfocodi, ptomedicodi, meditotal, mediestado, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, E1, E2, E3, E4, E5, E6, E7, E8, E9, E10, E11, E12, E13, E14, E15, E16, E17, E18, E19, E20, E21, E22, E23, E24, lastuser, lastdate, emprcodi ) values( :enviocodi, :lectcodi, :medifecha, :tipoinfocodi, :ptomedicodi, :meditotal, :mediestado, :h1, :h2, :h3, :h4, :h5, :h6, :h7, :h8, :h9, :h10, :h11, :h12, :h13, :h14, :h15, :h16, :h17, :h18, :h19, :h20, :h21, :h22, :h23, :h24, :E1, :E2, :E3, :E4, :E5, :E6, :E7, :E8, :E9, :E10, :E11, :E12, :E13, :E14, :E15, :E16, :E17, :E18, :E19, :E20, :E21, :E22, :E23, :E24, :lastuser, :lastdate, :emprcodi )

SELECT DISTINCT M24.*,TPTO.TPTOMEDINOMB,EQ.EQUINOMB,TI.TIPOINFOABREV,PTO.PTOMEDIBARRANOMB, EQ.FAMCODI, TPTO.TPTOMEDICODI, EMPR.EMPRCODI, EMPR.EMPRNOMB, EQ1.EQUICODI,EQ1.EQUINOMB CUENCA,EQ.EQUIPADRE FROM ME_MEDICION_EJECUTADOS24 M24 INNER JOIN ME_HOJAPTOMED HP ON HP.PTOMEDICODI = M24.PTOMEDICODI AND HP.TIPOINFOCODI = M24.TIPOINFOCODI INNER JOIN ME_FORMATO F ON F.FORMATCODI = HP.FORMATCODI INNER JOIN ME_PTOMEDICION PTO ON PTO.PTOMEDICODI = M24.PTOMEDICODI INNER JOIN EQ_EQUIPO EQ ON EQ.EQUICODI = PTO.EQUICODI LEFT JOIN EQ_EQUIPO EQ1 ON EQ1.EQUICODI = EQ.EQUIPADRE INNER JOIN ME_TIPOPTOMEDICION TPTO ON TPTO.TPTOMEDICODI = PTO.TPTOMEDICODI INNER JOIN SI_TIPOINFORMACION TI ON TI.TIPOINFOCODI = M24.TIPOINFOCODI INNER JOIN SI_EMPRESA EMPR ON EMPR.EMPRCODI = (CASE WHEN COALESCE(M24.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 THEN M24.EMPRCODI ELSE PTO.EMPRCODI END) INNER JOIN ME_ENVIO_HORARIO HOR ON M24.ENVIOCODI = HOR.ENVIOCODI WHERE (HP.FORMATCODI = {0} OR ('{0}' ='-1')) AND F.LECTCODI = M24.LECTCODI AND M24.MEDIFECHA >= TO_DATE('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND M24.MEDIFECHA <= TO_DATE('{2}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND (HOR.HORARIOCODI = {3} OR ('{3}' = '0')) AND M24.ENVIOCODI = (SELECT MAX(SME.ENVIOCODI) FROM ME_MEDICION_EJECUTADOS24 SME INNER JOIN ME_ENVIO_HORARIO SHOR ON SME.ENVIOCODI = SHOR.ENVIOCODI WHERE SME.LECTCODI = M24.LECTCODI AND SME.PTOMEDICODI = M24.PTOMEDICODI AND SME.MEDIFECHA = M24.MEDIFECHA AND SME.EMPRCODI = M24.EMPRCODI AND SME.TIPOINFOCODI = M24.TIPOINFOCODI AND SHOR.HORARIOCODI = {3} OR ('{3}' = '0') AND SME.EMPRCODI = M24.EMPRCODI) ORDER BY 1 ASC, 2 ASC

select (case when coalesce(me.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 then me.EMPRCODI else pto.emprcodi end) AS EMPRCODI, me.* from ME_MEDICION24_INTRANET me inner join me_hojaptomed hp on hp.ptomedicodi = me.ptomedicodi and hp.tipoinfocodi = me.tipoinfocodi inner join me_formato f on f.formatcodi = hp.formatcodi inner join me_ptomedicion pto on pto.ptomedicodi = hp.ptomedicodi where (hp.formatcodi = {0} or ('{0}' ='-1')) and f.lectcodi = me.lectcodi and ((case when coalesce(me.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 then me.EMPRCODI else pto.emprcodi end) = {1} or ('{1}' ='-1')) and medifecha >= to_date('{2}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND medifecha <= to_date('{3}','YYYY-MM-DD') order by hp.HPTOORDEN asc

insert into ME_MEDICION24_INTRANET( enviocodi, lectcodi, medifecha, tipoinfocodi, ptomedicodi, meditotal, mediestado, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, lastuser, lastdate, emprcodi ) values( :enviocodi, :lectcodi, :medifecha, :tipoinfocodi, :ptomedicodi, :meditotal, :mediestado, :h1, :h2, :h3, :h4, :h5, :h6, :h7, :h8, :h9, :h10, :h11, :h12, :h13, :h14, :h15, :h16, :h17, :h18, :h19, :h20, :h21, :h22, :h23, :h24, :lastuser, :lastdate, :emprcodi )

SELECT M24.*,TPTO.TPTOMEDINOMB,EQ.EQUINOMB,TI.TIPOINFOABREV,PTO.PTOMEDIBARRANOMB, EQ.FAMCODI, TPTO.TPTOMEDICODI, EMPR.EMPRCODI, EMPR.EMPRNOMB, EQ1.EQUICODI,EQ1.EQUINOMB CUENCA,EQ.EQUIPADRE FROM ME_MEDICION24_INTRANET M24 INNER JOIN ME_HOJAPTOMED HP ON HP.PTOMEDICODI = M24.PTOMEDICODI AND HP.TIPOINFOCODI = M24.TIPOINFOCODI INNER JOIN ME_FORMATO F ON F.FORMATCODI = HP.FORMATCODI INNER JOIN ME_PTOMEDICION PTO ON PTO.PTOMEDICODI = M24.PTOMEDICODI INNER JOIN EQ_EQUIPO EQ ON EQ.EQUICODI = PTO.EQUICODI INNER JOIN EQ_EQUIPO EQ1 ON EQ1.EQUICODI = EQ.EQUIPADRE INNER JOIN ME_TIPOPTOMEDICION TPTO ON TPTO.TPTOMEDICODI = PTO.TPTOMEDICODI INNER JOIN SI_TIPOINFORMACION TI ON TI.TIPOINFOCODI = M24.TIPOINFOCODI INNER JOIN SI_EMPRESA EMPR ON EMPR.EMPRCODI = (CASE WHEN COALESCE(M24.EMPRCODI, -1) > 0 THEN M24.EMPRCODI ELSE PTO.EMPRCODI END) WHERE (HP.FORMATCODI = {0} OR ('{0}' ='-1')) AND F.LECTCODI = M24.LECTCODI AND M24.MEDIFECHA >= TO_DATE('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND M24.MEDIFECHA <= TO_DATE('{2}','YYYY-MM-DD') AND M24.ENVIOCODI = (SELECT MAX(ENVIOCODI) FROM ME_MEDICION24_INTRANET WHERE LECTCODI = M24.LECTCODI AND PTOMEDICODI = M24.PTOMEDICODI AND MEDIFECHA = M24.MEDIFECHA AND EMPRCODI = M24.EMPRCODI AND TIPOINFOCODI = M24.TIPOINFOCODI) ORDER BY 1 ASC, 2 ASC
